hero.title: Stop wondering "What's for dinner?"
hero.subtitle: Plan your meals with ease, track nutrition, manage grocery costs, and share recipes with a global community of home cooks.

features.title: How AngiDay Makes Meal Planning Easy
features.subtitle: Our comprehensive suite of tools helps you save time, reduce stress, and enjoy delicious meals every day.

mealPlanning.title: Personalized Meal Planning
mealPlanning.description: Create daily, weekly, or monthly meal plans tailored to your preferences, dietary needs, and schedule.

recipeDiscovery.title: Recipe Discovery
recipeDiscovery.description: Browse thousands of recipes from various cuisines, filtered by dietary needs, ingredients, prep time, and more.

shoppingList.title: Automated Shopping Lists
shoppingList.description: Generate shopping lists from your meal plans, organized by category with cost tracking.

nutritionTracking.title: Nutrition Tracking
nutritionTracking.description: Monitor calories, macros, and nutritional values for each meal and your entire meal plan.

community.title: Community Sharing
community.description: Share your favorite recipes and meal plans with the AngiDay community and discover popular creations.

recommendations.title: Personalized Recommendations
recommendations.description: Get AI-powered meal suggestions based on your preferences, past choices, and seasonal ingredients.
